story.iWant: to edit all details of an existing product, including name, description, price, stock, land of origin, and vitola
story.soThat: I can maintain accurate and and complete product information

acceptanceCriteria.criterion: From the product list in the admin interface, I can select a product to edit.
The edit form pre-populates with existing product data.
I can modify the product's name, description, price, stock quantity, land of origin, and vitola (FR014).
Changes are saved and reflected in the customer-facing catalog.

file.reason: The edit dialog form will be extended with new fields.
The PUT handler needs to be verified to handle all new fields.

interface.name: PUT /api/products/:id
interface.reason: The endpoint for updating a product.

ideas.idea: Write an E2E test that edits all fields of a product and then verifies the changes on both the admin and public-facing pages.
